Entries.{{Raven}}_CheckIn/p {{Raven}}/j 14/f/w s:
jaunty/23 21/farmer 10 23 1 {{Raven}} 15 17 1/skippable/
--Farmer walks in front of BusStop intersection sign/
                    move farmer 12 0 1/emote farmer {{emoteQuestion}} true/playSound leafrustle/
--Farmer faces Raven as they walk, Raven also curious/
                    move {{Raven}} 7 0 {{right}} true/faceDirection farmer {{up}}/move {{Raven}} 0 4 2/pause 300/emote {{Raven}} {{emoteQuestion}}/
--Raven asks if the farmer is free to talk/
                    speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_1}}"/pause 300/emote farmer {{emoteMusic}}/pause 300/
--Raven goes on a monologue/
                    speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_2}}"/pause 300/faceDirection {{Raven}} {{right}}/speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_3}}"/pause 300/faceDirection {{Raven}} {{down}}/speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_4}}"/pause 300/emote {{Raven}} {{emoteSweat}} true/playSound dwop/pause 2000/
--quickQuestion CheckIn/
            quickQuestion {{i18n:CheckIn_qQ}}#{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_1}}#{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_2}}#{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3}}
                (break)mail {{Raven}}_CheckIn_1\friendship {{Raven}} 10\emote farmer {{emoteMusic}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_1_1}}"\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{right}}\pause 300\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{down}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_1_2}}"\emote {{Raven}} {{emoteSweat}} true\playSound dwop\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_1_3}}"
                (break)mail {{Raven}}_CheckIn_2\friendship {{Raven}} 5\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_2_1}}"\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{right}}\pause 300\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{down}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_2_2}}"\pause 300\emote farmer {{emoteQuestion}}\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_2_3}}"
                (break)mail {{Raven}}_CheckIn_3\friendship {{Raven}} 10\emote farmer {{emoteSweat}} true\playSound dwop\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3_1}}"\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{right}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3_2}}"\pause 300\faceDirection {{Raven}} {{down}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3_3}}"\pause 300\emote {{Raven}} {{emoteSweat}} true\playSound dwop\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3_4}}"\pause 300\emote farmer {{emoteMusic}}\pause 300\speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_qQ_3_5}}"/
                    pause 300/
--Raven ends the conversation/
                    speak {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_5}}"/pause 300/emote {{Raven}} {{emoteHappy}} true/emote farmer {{emoteHappy}}/
--End with dialogue/
                    end dialogue {{Raven}} "{{i18n:CheckIn_end}}"
